Items.name: Crimson Enigma
Items.description: A mystical, crimson-hued antique television set that appears straight out of a Stephen King novel, evoking an inexplicable air of mystery and intrigue.

Items.name: Cursed Antique Doll
Items.description: A hauntingly cursed antique doll, rumored to possess an eerie aura and a dark history. Beware of its enigmatic allure.

Items.name: Pocket Watch
Items.description: A malevolent antique pocket watch shrouded in an aura of mystery and foreboding. Legends speak of its cursed nature and ominous influence.

Items.name: Enigmatic Table Mirror
Items.description: An enigmatic and ornate table mirror exuding an air of mystique and elegance. Its intricate design adds allure to any space.

Items.name: Mystical Tarot Deck
Items.description: A mystical tarot deck featuring intricate illustrations and enigmatic symbolism. Each card holds secrets of the past, present, and future.

Items.name: Eternal Blossoms Collection
Items.description: The Eternal Blossoms Collection presents a range of enchanting flowers that never wither, retaining their beauty indefinitely. Perfect for everlasting displays.

Items.name: Skull
Items.description: A uniquely crafted skull resembling a heart, symbolizing an unconventional blend of love and mortality. An intriguing piece that challenges traditional perceptions.

Items.name: Rabbit Hole Tea Cup
Items.description: The Rabbit Hole Tea Cup offers a whimsical journey through wonderland with every sip. Delight in its magical design that transports you down the enchanting rabbit hole.

Items.name: Vintage Brief Case
Items.description: The Vintage Brief Case, adorned with a gold metal handle, emanates an air of elegance and sophistication. Crafted in a rich brown hue, it exudes timeless charm and is perfect for storing treasured documents.

Items.name: Vintage Candlestick Holder
Items.description: The Vintage Candlestick Holder, with its ornate design and exquisite craftsmanship, exudes timeless beauty. Crafted to hold candles, this piece adds a touch of old-world charm and sophistication to any setting.

Items.name: Green Wall-Mounted Sconce
Items.description: The Green Wall-Mounted Sconce infuses a vibrant hue into your space, offering a refreshing and modern touch. Crafted in a verdant green shade, this sconce radiates a calming ambiance and stylishly illuminates your walls with a contemporary flair.

Items.name: Wooden Four-Legged Work Desk
Items.description: The Wooden Four-Legged Work Desk is a sturdy and functional piece, ideal for work or study spaces. Crafted from high-quality wood, it features a spacious tabletop providing ample room for various tasks. Its four-legged design ensures stability and durability, adding a touch of natural elegance to your workspace.
